enWisdom: Knowledge is the fecundation of cognizance
Knowledge is the lamp of the intellect and the fountain of excellence

Wisdom: الْعِلْمُ يَدُلُّ عَلَى الْعَقْلِ فَمَنْ عَقِلَ عَلِمَ [فَمَنْ عَلِمَ عَقِلَ‏]
enWisdom: Knowledge is evidence of intellect, so the one who knows has intelligence

Wisdom: أَعْوَنُ الْأَشْيَاءِ عَلَى تَزْكِيَةِ الْعَقْلِ التَّعْلِيمُ
enWisdom: The most helpful thing in purifying the intellect is education
